synopsis.text:
He aded to live with her uncle in a seaside town, a young girl named Claire, also known as Aiko, grapples with the mystery of her father's disappearance at sea years ago. As her mother pursues a career in fashion design in Paris, Claire clings to hope that her father will return.

The loss of her beloved pet dog, Papi, in a tragic car accident leaves Claire heartbroken and isolated. However, fate brings her a new canine companion, Spank, who shares a similar story of loss, as his previous owner also vanished at sea. Spank's charming, sociable nature helps Claire form new friendships and rediscover joy in her life.

As she navigates her first year in junior high school, Claire develops a crush on Andreas, the athletic brother of Spank's former owner. Together with her newfound friends and Spank by her side, Claire learns to embrace the challenges of adolescence while holding onto the belief that her father will one day come home.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
